A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie starts off confusing for people that didn't watch the other Star Wars movies. It jumps around\, and gets confusing at points. Though it does clear up. The movie has a nice approach of tying the original and prequel series\, and opens up the possibilities of the future. For me\, it died not clear up my big question going in\, so I'm not sure how to react. This may be good at some points of view. Overall\, it is good\, though it does let down the audience at some points. I liked the huge twist at the end\, and it is time for theorizing what episode IX will be.
